p: The title compound’s single-crystal emission signal was measured by exciting a single-crystal with a 460 nm laser (model Sapphire 460/10, 10 mW; COHERENT, USA). The converted light was collected using a multi-mode optical fiber (QP 600–2-VIS/BX; Ocean Optics, USA) and finally detected in a spectrometer (QE 65000; Ocean Optics, USA).
